akn:section.akn:heading: Bonds; limitation of issuance under sections 831n and 831n–1

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 831n–2. Bonds; limitation of issuance under sections 831n and 831n–1 No bonds shall be issued by the Corporation after the date of enactment of this section under section 831n or 831n–1 of this title. (May 18, 1933, ch. 32, § 15b, as added July 26, 1939, ch. 366, 53 Stat. 1083.)
Editorial Notes
References in TextThe date of enactment of this section, referred to in text, probably means July 26, 1939.
